SEARCH
Package com.movierental

Class Rental

java.lang.Object
com.movierental.Rental
public class Rental extends Object
Represents a movie rental by a customer. Stores borrowing and returning dates and the IDs of both the customer and the rented movie, and provides methods to calculate fees.

This class implements the Payment interface.

    • getDateReturned

      public LocalDate getDateReturned()
      Returns the date the movie was returned. Is null if the movie has not yet been returned.
      Returns:
      the return date or null

    • getNightsRented

      public int getNightsRented()
      Calculates how many nights the movie has been rented for. Requires that the movie has already been returned.
      Returns:
      the number of nights between borrowed and returned dates
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the return date is before the borrow date

    • details

      public void details()
      Prints detailed information about the rental, including borrow and return dates (if returned or not).

    • calculate

      public double calculate(String membership)
      Calculates the rental fee based on membership type and duration. The first 7 nights are included in the base fee. Additional nights charges extra.

      com.movierental.Student: base fee = $5, +$1 per extra night.
      External: base fee = $10, +$2 per extra night.

      Parameters:
      membership - the type of membership (com.movierental.Student/External)
      Returns:
      the calculated rental fee
